talents.desc: 50% of the damage dealt by Hungering Arrow is returned as Health to Valla.
talents.name: Siphoning Arrow

talents.desc: Hungering Arrow range increased by 25% and the number of times it can bounce to 3.
talents.name: Puncturing Arrow

talents.desc: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.
talents.name: Repeating Arrow

talents.desc: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 15 (+6.75 per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.
talents.name: Strafe

talents.desc: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.
talents.name: Giant Killer

talents.desc: Vault gains an additional charge, allowing it to be cast twice in quick succession.
talents.name: Tumble

talents.desc: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
talents.name: Bolt of the Storm

talents.desc: Increases the range of Multishot by 20%.
talents.name: Composite Arrows

talents.desc: Multishot also fires 3 grenades, which deal 35 (+7.5 per level) damage.
talents.name: Arsenal

talents.desc: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds. Each attack costs 15 Mana.

talents.desc: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.
